title: Bug 106269Cannot set a background image in a style
description: Eclipse 3.1, GEF 3.1, EMOSDOSDK 2.1.0, BIRT 1.0.1GTK+ 2.6.8 (Debian Linux)1. Navigate to a directory containing some png imagesnone are displayedHow is this FileDialog being created?What filter pattern is being used?
OB: A file chooser dialog opens with a filter called "SWT image (gif, jpeg,png, ico, bmp)".6.
SR: Bug 106269Cannot set a background image in a style Open the report editor on a report2. In the layout tab, right click in the report and choose StyleAdd Style...3. Choose Background in the list on the left4. Click Browse5.
